bug.short_desc: Remove the embed namespace in the next branch

long_desc.thetext:
The qx.ui.embed namespace features currently two widgets. Both are not necessary anymore:
qx.ui.embed.Canvas ------------------------ Is basically a forward of the native canvas methods like getContext. As it is pretty easy for the user to work with native DOM objects in the new system, there is no need to offer such a forwarding widget.
qx.ui.embed.Html --------------------- Only offers a property named 'html' which forwards to the setHtml method. As this is a standard collection API, there is no need to offer such a widget.

1. There is no need to remove the whole canvas page in the showcase. This could also be done with native canvas elements. Please get that page back in there using the native canvas element.
2. The namespace itself including its __init__.js file is still there --> remove that as well.
Remove namespace and re-enable example with native canvas in next branch with d9f9996d9001f0c8dcada1bcfe664781df4a5e9a
